Body: Description: The code signing certificate on pingcastle.exe 3.3.0.1 and pingcastleautoupdater.exe expired on 10/22/2024 and one of our clients is refusing to allow us to execute the tool on their systems because of it.
What We've Learned Updated: the code signing certificate is expired. -they need to download version 3.3.0.8 from the portal
Next Steps Updated: Wait for customer to download version 3.3.0.8
Steps to Reproduce Updated: 1- Verify the Pingcastle.exe code signing certificate and find it expired.
